content: 2hdc in background 1hdc in dark green 3hdc in light green 3hdc in dark green 2hdc in light green 8hdc in dark green 2hdc in light green 3hdc in dark green 2hdc in light green 2hdc in dark green 3hdc in background flip row 4-32 continue back and forth going up the chart row 33 is attaching to dowel 32sc over dowel tie off weave in ends for hanger tie yarn to either side of dowel to desired length this will stretch slightly once hung hang them up and enjoy
